option.text: 项目组功能类问题各状态占比

dataset.name: test
dataset.sql: SELECT id, name, description, is_in_chlog, `position`, is_in_roadmap, fields_bits, default_status_id FROM grafana.redmine_trackers

dataset.name: redmine_issues_problem
dataset.sql:
SELECT '待认领总数' AS NAME, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues WHERE status_id = (SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='待认领' ) and project_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value"
UNION ALL SELECT '处理中总数' AS NAME ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues WHERE status_id = (SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='处理中' ) and project_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '待审核总数' AS NAME ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues WHERE status_id = (SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='待审核' ) and project_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '测试中总数' AS NAME ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues WHERE status_id = (SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='测试中' ) and project_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '待上线总数' AS NAME ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues i WHERE i.project_id = (SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) AND i.status_id =(SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='待上线' ) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '已上线总数' AS NAME ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues i WHERE i.project_id = (SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) AND i.status_id =(SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='已上线' ) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '已撤销总数' AS NAME ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues i WHERE i.project_id = (SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) AND i.status_id =(SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='已撤销' ) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '待部署总数' AS NAME ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues i WHERE i.project_id = (SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) AND i.status_id =(SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='待部署' ) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '测试打回总数' AS NAME ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM redmine_issues i WHERE i.project_id = (SELECT id FROM redmine_projects WHERE name=:teamName) AND i.status_id =(SELECT id FROM issue_statuses WHERE name='测试打回' ) and tracker_id =(SELECT id FROM redmine_trackers rt WHERE rt.name='功能' ) ) AS "value"
